welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Narragansett, the charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches, delicious seafood and vibrant community. We invite you to immerse yourself in our local culture and soak up all the wonders this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westerly State Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westerly State Airport offers exclusive services for private and charter flights, including VIP lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Block Island Airport is a small, single-story building with limited amenities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at T. F. Green Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New London Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New London Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
